title: Have you ever lost a battle of wits? - Quora

response.answer_text: Only once. I like to talk to the customers and only one has ever gotten the better of me. He must have bought some wine because I checked his ID and he had a Florida license. He also bought a can of nuts. As I was putting them in the bag I said that he had come a long way to buy some nuts. He said that’s because all the biggest nuts are in Vermont. I had to give him that one.
